form.label: Zeek SMTP (V1.0)
form.description: V1 Additions: First generation of dashboard

search.query:
index= sourcetype="zeek:smtp:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format]
| fillnull value="-" id.resp_h, src_user, recipient | stats count by subject,id.orig_h, src_user, id.resp_h, recipient | sort -count
| rename subject AS "Subject",id.resp_h AS "Destination", src_user AS "Sender", recipient AS "Recipient", id.orig_h AS "Source"

index= sourcetype="zeek:smtp:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format]
| fillnull value="-" last_reply, id.resp_h, src_user, recipient | stats count by last_reply, id.orig_h, src_user, id.resp_h, recipient | where !like (last_reply, "%Queued mail for delivery") AND !like (last_reply, "%2.0.0 Service closing transmission channel") AND !like(last_reply, "220 2.0.0 SMTP server ready") | sort -count
| rename last_reply AS "Last Reply",id.resp_h AS "Destination", src_user AS "Sender", recipient AS "Recipient", id.orig_h AS "Source"
